mapper.select: SELECT prf_tmp FROM BitFinalTeam2.ur_prf where ur_num=#{ur_num}
mapper.update: update ur_prf set prf_tmp=#{avgtmp} where ur_num=#{ur_num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from (select sp.sp_title, pd_img.img_name, rv.touser, sp.pd_num, sp.ur_num, sp.sp_num, min(fromseller) fromseller from rv join sp on sp.sp_num=rv.sp_num join pd_img on pd_img.pd_num=sp.pd_num where touser=#{ur_num} or touser= ANY (select sp.ur_num from sp join rv on rv.sp_num= sp.sp_num where touser=#{ur_num} group by sp.ur_num) group by sp_num) as rvlist where rvlist.touser=#{ur_num} and rvlist.ur_num!=#{ur_num} and fromseller=1

select * from (select sp.sp_title, pd_img.img_name, rv.touser, sp.pd_num, sp.ur_num, sp.sp_num, min(fromseller) fromseller from rv join sp on sp.sp_num=rv.sp_num join pd_img on pd_img.pd_num=sp.pd_num where touser=#{ur_num} or fromuser=#{ur_num} group by sp_num) as rvlist where rvlist.touser=#{ur_num} and rvlist.ur_num !=#{ur_num} order by fromseller desc

select sp.sp_num, sp.sp_title, pd_img.img_name, rv.rv_num, rv.touser, rv.rv_txt,rv.rv_tmp, sp.pd_num,fromuser,ur_prf.prf_nick,ur_prf.prf_img from cr join sp on sp.sp_num=cr.sp_num join pd_img on pd_img.pd_num=sp.pd_num join rv on rv.sp_num=sp.sp_num join ur_prf on ur_prf.ur_num=rv.fromuser where touser=#{ur_num} group by rv_num order by rv_wdate desc
SELECT sp.sp_num, sp.pd_num, sp.sp_title, pd_img.img_name, pd_status FROM sp join pd_img on pd_img.pd_num=sp.pd_num join pd on pd.pd_num=sp.pd_num where ur_num=#{ur_num} group by sp.sp_num
select ur_num,fd_num, fd_title,fd_img from fd where ur_num=#{ur_num}

select sp_like.sp_num, sp.sp_title, sp.pd_num, pd_img.img_name, pd.pd_status from sp_like join sp on sp.sp_num=sp_like.sp_num join pd_img on pd_img.pd_num=sp.pd_num join pd on pd.pd_num=sp.pd_num where sp_like.ur_num=#{ur_num} group by sp_num
select fd_like.fd_num, fd.fd_title,fd.fd_img from fd_like join fd on fd.fd_num=fd_like.fd_num where fd_like.ur_num=#{ur_num}
select * from ur_info where ur_num=#{ur_num}
select sp.ur_num from sp group by ur_num having count(*)=(select max(cnt) from (select ur_num, count(*) cnt from sp group by ur_num ) as mx)
select rv.touser from rv where fromseller=1 group by touser having count(*)= (select max(cnt) from (select touser, count(*) cnt from rv where fromseller=1 group by touser) as mx)
select ur_num from ur_prf as tb1 where tb1.prf_tmp=(select max(tb2.prf_tmp) from ur_prf as tb2)
select sp_like.ur_num from sp_like group by ur_num having count(*)= (select max(cnt) from (select ur_num, count(*) cnt from sp_like group by ur_num ) as mx)
select fd_like.ur_num from fd_like group by ur_num having count(*)= (select max(cnt) from (select ur_num, count(*) cnt from fd_like group by ur_num ) as mx)

SELECT a.ur_num,a.fd_num, a.fd_title, c.prf_nick, c.prf_img, a.fd_img, a.fd_wdate,a.fd_rdcnt, a.fd_style, b.likes fd_likes from fd a left outer join ur_prf c on a.ur_num=c.ur_num left outer join (select count(*) likes , fd_num from fd_like group by fd_num) b on a.fd_num=b.fd_num where fd_title like concat('%',#{search_word},'%') union SELECT a.ur_num,a.fd_num, a.fd_title, c.prf_nick, c.prf_img, a.fd_img, a.fd_wdate,a.fd_rdcnt, a.fd_style, b.likes fd_likes from fd a left outer join ur_prf c on a.ur_num=c.ur_num left outer join (select count(*) likes , fd_num from fd_like group by fd_num) b on a.fd_num=b.fd_num where fd_txt like concat('%',#{search_word},'%') union SELECT a.ur_num,a.fd_num, a.fd_title, c.prf_nick, c.prf_img, a.fd_img, a.fd_wdate,a.fd_rdcnt, a.fd_style, b.likes fd_likes from fd a left outer join ur_prf c on a.ur_num=c.ur_num left outer join (select count(*) likes , fd_num from fd_like group by fd_num) b on a.fd_num=b.fd_num where prf_nick like concat('%',#{search_word},'%')

select sp.ur_num,sp.sp_num, sp.pd_num, sp.sp_title, prf_nick, prf_img, img_name img_first, pd_price, pd_status from sp join ur_prf on ur_prf.ur_num=sp.ur_num join pd_img on pd_img.pd_num=sp.pd_num join pd on pd.pd_num=sp.pd_num where sp_title like concat('%',#{search_word} ,'%') group by sp.sp_num union select sp.ur_num,sp.sp_num, sp.pd_num, sp.sp_title, prf_nick, prf_img, img_name img_first, pd_price, pd_status from sp join ur_prf on ur_prf.ur_num=sp.ur_num join pd_img on pd_img.pd_num=sp.pd_num join pd on pd.pd_num=sp.pd_num where sp_txt like concat('%',#{search_word} ,'%') group by sp.sp_num union select sp.ur_num,sp.sp_num, sp.pd_num, sp.sp_title, prf_nick, prf_img, img_name img_first, pd_price, pd_status from sp join ur_prf on ur_prf.ur_num=sp.ur_num join pd_img on pd_img.pd_num=sp.pd_num join pd on pd.pd_num=sp.pd_num where prf_nick like concat('%',#{search_word} ,'%') group by sp.sp_num order by pd_status
